capabilities.name: fetch_mcp_cloudflare_docs
capabilities.description: Fetch entire documentation file from GitHub repository: gilberth/mcp-cloudflare. Useful for general questions. Always call this tool first if asked about gilberth/mcp-cloudflare.

capabilities.name: search_mcp_cloudflare_docs
capabilities.description: Semantically search within the fetched documentation from GitHub repository: gilberth/mcp-cloudflare. Useful for specific queries.

capabilities.name: search_mcp_cloudflare_code
capabilities.description: Search for code within the GitHub repository: "gilberth/mcp-cloudflare" using the GitHub Search API (exact match). Returns matching files for you to query further if relevant.

capabilities.name: fetch_generic_url_content
capabilities.description: Generic tool to fetch content from any absolute URL, respecting robots.txt rules. Use this to retrieve referenced urls (absolute urls) that were mentioned in previously fetched documentation.
